aircraft.value: Dragonfly Scout - AC-1966-759 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Oil consumption rate increase. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 28/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 01/12/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 03/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 01/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 04/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
